body:
Hi, I'm Captain_Craft755 i recently build a nebula map on a singleplayer map. Ive had people seen it and they say its sick/cool its called Lonely Mine. I really think it would b nice on Avicus but i don't know how to submit it any tips would help a lot Thx

-Capatin

title: New Nebula map

replies.body:
How to proper release a map by Funkystudios: http://avicus.net/forums/2360ee224
How to package a map by ParaSpider: http://avicus.net/forums/c55047443
Hope that map looks cool ^_^
Good luck!
